charges.charge_description: FAILURE TO MAINTAIN AN ACCURATE OIL RECORD BOOK - 33 USC 1908(a)(1-3)

charges.charge_disposition: PROBATION: 3 YEARS. FINE: $1,005,000.00. SPECIAL ASSESSMENT: $400 FOR COUNTS 1,2, AND 3 FOR A TOTAL OF $1,200.00. Amended Judgment as to Fujitrans Corporation , Count(s) 1-3, PROBATION: 3 YEARS. FINE: $1,005,000.00. SPECIAL ASSESSMENT: $400 FOR COUNTS 1,2, AND 3 FOR A TOTAL OF $1,200.00. AMENDED 2/14/05 TO REFLECT CHANGE IN PARAGRAPH 5 - REMAINDER OF THE JUDGMENT IS THE SAME. Signed by Judge Garr M. King on 2/3/05.
